products.name: Mouse Steelseries Rival 3
products.description: SteelSeries Rival 3 Wireless uses new Quantum 2.0 Dual Wireless technology to deliver ultra-low latency wireless technology with 400+ hours of battery life, plus two types of wireless connectivity for pinpoint performance and year-round versatility.

products.name: Apple MacBook Air M1
products.description: The power of Apple's M1 processor completely revolutionizes Apple's thinnest and lightest laptop. Up to 3.5X faster CPU speeds. Up to 5x faster GPU speeds. The most advanced Neural Engine ever, for up to 9x faster machine learning. The longest battery life ever in a MacBook Air. And a silent, fanless design. Never seen so much power together and so portable.

products.name: Apple Macbook Pro M2
products.description: The Apple Macbook Pro doesn't know what it's like to be still. With the new M2 processor, the 13-inch MacBook Pro is more efficient than ever. It has the same compact design, up to 20 hours of battery life and an active cooling system for super-fast performance. It's the easiest Pro laptop to take with you and packs a stunning Retina display, FaceTime HD camera and studio-quality microphones.

Introducing the Logitech MX Master 3S, an iconic mouse reimagined for ultimate tactile feel, performance and fluidity.  Quiet clicking buttons offer a satisfying tactile feel with 90% less clicking noise. MX Master 3S now also features an 8K optical sensor for next-gen responsiveness on any surface, even glass.
products.name: Logitech MX Master 3S
Logitech MX Keys Mini
products.description: ntroducing the Logitech MX Keys Mini, a smaller, smarter, more powerful keyboard for creators. Type confidently on this efficient, stable and accurate keyboard. The ergonomic design lines up with your shoulders. Position the mouse closer to the keyboard, without having to stretch your arm, for greater comfort and a better body position.

products.name: Mi Curved Gaming 34"
products.description: Immerse yourself in an immersive and exciting gaming and entertainment experience with the 34" UltraWide Xiaomi Mi Curved Gaming Monitor, featuring WQHD resolution (3440 x 1440 pixels), extreme 1500R curvature and a high refresh rate of 144 Hz.

products.name: Equip Monitor Lamp
products.description: Equip's USB LED monitor light with suspension design, which adapts asymmetrical light path, reducing screen glare and effectively protecting your eyes. Snap-on design for installing the work lamp fits any monitor.  PC workplace eye-friendly lighting: the USB lamp is located on the top of the monitor, it only radiates downwards and forwards, perfectly and evenly illuminates the area in front of the monitor, infinitely adjustable color temperature and brightness through tactile buttons, you can adjust your personal light according to your needs and preferences.

products.name: Apple Magic Mouse
products.description: The Apple Magic Mouse is wireless and rechargeable, with a new base that slides seamlessly onto your desk.  And with the Multi-Touch surface, you can perform simple gestures like swiping between websites or scrolling through your documents. Thanks to its built-in long-lasting battery, you can forget about charging your Magic Mouse for a month or more.  It's ready to use right out of the box and automatically pairs with your Mac. Plus, it includes a braided USB-C to Lightning cable that lets you connect and charge it through your Mac's USB-C port.

The Apple Magic Keyboard lets you type with complete precision and comfort.  In addition, it is wireless and rechargeable, and incorporates a built-in long-lasting battery. So you can forget about recharging your keyboard for a month or more.  It automatically links to your Mac so you can use it right away. It also includes a braided USB-C to Lightning cable to connect and charge through your Mac's USB-C port.
products.name: Apple Magic Keyboard
Tempest K20 Beast Keyboard
products.description: A new beast has arrived in the keyboard range - The new Tempest Keyboard K20 Beast. A keyboard with an exclusive design for games to offer you the best guarantee and success in your games. Removing the side numerical keyboard gives you greater freedom of movement so that your reaction and response times are considerably reduced, as you avoid the effect of a collision between the mouse and the keyboard. If you want to make a difference, buy this keyboard now.

products.name: Jabra PanaCast Hub USB-C
products.description: Jabra PanaCast USB Hub USB-C. A central unit that connects the Jabra PanaCast and Jabra Speak to your computer using a single cable.

products.name: Apple AirPods 3rd Generation
products.description: AirPods weigh nothing and offer an anatomical fit. They are positioned at the perfect angle to give you greater comfort and bring the sound directly to your ears. In addition, they are 33% shorter than AirPods (2nd generation) and include a pressure sensor that allows you to easily control music and calls.

I just received this laptop! And I highly recommend it, but if you have a heavy job you might want to get the professional
It's my first Mac. I always thought they were too expensive until the M1 chip. Then with the M2 they already embroidered. Very happy
Very good buy, it has a dual connection type, bluetooth and wireless. Perfect for use with NVIDIA SHIELD

Very good, the response time is instantaneous and the batteries last about 2 weeks if you play almost all day. The only thing is that the size is a little small, if you usually pick up your mouse with your entire palm, this is not the mouse for you. For the rest, this mouse is very good, I am quite satisfied that it does not have a cable and is light
